page.title: 02PORTWAY JUNIOR SCHOOL CONT
page.content: The Pet Garden was opened in l9__, it was closed in l979 because the vet said that animals could spread diseasestochildren.The Pet Garden comprised ofsome peacocks, chicken, rabbits,doves and other animals. Harry said that some animals were sold and sadly a dog killedthe rest. Mrs. Crocker joined the school as a secretary in l952, her successor in l97l was Mrs. B. Eustace and over the years Mrs. Eustace has used an old typewriter but since the mid l980's she is able to use an electronic typewriter, the inside mechanisms are VASTLY smallified. In l982 the Model B, BBC Micro Computers were introduced into the school. In the playground there used to be a caravan, an aeroplane and a fire engine.
